p: The details of non-timber forest product use in the Upper Madi Watershed of Nepal, number of non-timber forest plant species, purpose of NTFPs collection, respondent perceptions of climate change, perceived impacts of climate change on non-timber forest products ecosystem services are described in Table 2, Table 3, Table 4, Table 5, Table 6, Table 7, Table 8. Data are provided as a supplementary file.
